title: Help League Crashing straight to Bug Splat  right after Champ Select
body:
I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling, cleaned the pc up, deleted all my streaming/social programs even tried it on a different account and it wont work. I have tried running it admin and still nada. It worked last Saturday 8.6.16 but the next day after the patch it wont work for me! 

Note: 8 games I have tried to fix and now I get my first bans up to 20 minutes glad that my being a good sport and helpful player just doesn't matter everyone toxic can run around yet I get banned for RIOTS bugs. Thanks guys. 


Note: My account was accessible and played a game when my friend tried it on his own computer.

Note: I am on Windows 10

I put in a ticket but sent in 3 afterwords, before realizing it kicks the ticket to the back of the line its been about 3 days since i last reported and I have still yet to hear anything back. Is that normal? (I just play the game, I enjoy it and try not to dive to deep into the community because of the toxicity I have witnessed so I am not familiar with how they handle anything really)

replies.body: I appreciate the troubleshooting done so far, and I'd like to help!  It sounds like a hardware issue or corrupt game file is causing the game to render improperly and crash.  I suggest going through our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide.  These steps should get you resolved for good and streaming again!  Let me know if you have any questions!
